title: Joby delivers first aircraft to Dubai as air taxi service nears launch
summary: – The electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) company Joby Aviation has delivered its first production aircraft to Dubai, where it plans to launch a commercial air taxi service in early 2026. title: Kremlin says Europe will feel the recoil from its 'illegal' sanctions on Russia
summary: – Russia's invasion of Ukraine in 2022 triggered a wave of Western sanctions on Russia, and the West said that it hoped its sanctions would force President Vladimir Putin to seek peace in Ukraine, reports Reuters. The Kremlin said in remarks published on Sunday that the tougher the sanctions imposed on Russia by Europe, the more painful the recoil would be for Europe's own economies as Russia had grown resistant to such "illegal" sanctions.
